page.title: 06 FARMING CROPS 1
page.content: The main crop for S.A.Mossop(Farms)Ltd is Wheat,they have a total of 940 acres growing in the fields in 1985, Secondly are Peas used for Freezing with 237 acres growing in the fields in 1985. Other crops are Barley-127 acres, Potatoes-109 acres, Sugar Beet-167 acres and Rape for Oilseed-80 acres.The Wheat, Barley and Rape for Oilseed, once harvested,are taken to the stores for drying down.The farm is a member of Humber Grain Ltd of Station Rd.,Holton le Clay.The manager of Humber Grain Ltd sells all Mossops Wheat, Barley and Rape for Oilseed on their behalf.Sugar Beet is grown under contract to the British Sugar Corp. and the beet is transported between Sept. and Jan. to factories at Brigg or Bardney.Peas are grown under contract to Birds Eye Walls.
